name: task-incident-tracker
description: Full-stack Task and Incident Tracking Application

scripts.security-check: grep -r --exclude-dir=node_modules --exclude-dir=.git --exclude='*.md' -E '(password|secret|key|token|credential|mongodb://.*:.*@)' . || echo '✅ No secrets found in code'
scripts.setup-env: echo 'Setting up environment files...' && cp .env.template .env 2>/dev/null || true && cp server/.env.template server/.env 2>/dev/null || true && cp client/.env.template client/.env 2>/dev/null || true && echo '✅ Environment template files copied. Please edit them with your values.'

author: Task Tracker Team
